pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation and Plots of Influence Functions for Risk and Performance Measures // Computes the influence functions time series of the returns for the risk and performance measures as mentioned in Chen and Martin (2018) https://www.ssrn.com/abstract=3085672, as well as in Zhang et al. (2019) https://www.ssrn.com/abstract=3415903. Also evaluates estimators influence functions at a set of parameter values and plots them to display the shapes of the influence functions.
